name: Alice Tan
text_notes: I always pay my bills on time and have stable income. Applying for a small loan to renovate my kitchen.

name: Ben Lee
text_notes: Recently changed jobs but expect stable income soon. Need loan to cover moving expenses.

name: Chong Mei Ling
text_notes: I missed a few payments last year due to medical bills but I am recovering financially.

name: Daniel Wong
text_notes: I have multiple outstanding loans and struggling to repay them on time.

name: Eva Koh
text_notes: Strong financial background, saving regularly. Loan needed for investment property downpayment.

name: Farid Rahman
text_notes: Income is unstable because freelance. I hope to consolidate my debt but unsure about monthly payments.

name: Grace Lim
text_notes: I normally pay on time but had one late payment due to travel. Loan for car purchase.

name: Hafiz Abdullah
text_notes: Lost job recently and currently looking for new work. Need emergency funds.

name: Ivy Chan
text_notes: High income and good credit history. Loan to expand small business.

name: Jeremy Ng
text_notes: I have been borrowing from friends and family. Struggling to handle expenses.
